amendment.description: To provide Debbie Smith grants for auditing sexual assault evidence backlogs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2094 proposed by Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 2093.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2094, under the order of 4/26/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 84.
